templates_pairs:
hyprctl dispatch focuswindow "class:zen" > /dev/null
hyprshot -m window -m active --clipboard-only
hyprctl dispatch focuswindow "class:obsidian" >  /dev/null
{
  echo key alt+tab
  sleep 1
  echo key ctrl+v
  sleep 0.5
  echo key k:28
  sleep 0.5
  echo key shift+k:28
} | dotool

hyprctl dispatch focuswindow "class:obsidian" >/dev/null

echo key ctrl+c | dotool

wl-paste | trans -b | wl-copy
{
  echo key alt+tab
  echo key ctrl+v
} | dotool
